relations.target: excited: (of persons) excessively affected by emotion; 'he would become emotional over nothing at all'; 'she was worked up about all the noise' <i451>

turn: change to the contrary; 'The trend was reversed'; 'the tides turned against him'; 'public opinion turned when it was revealed that the president had an affair with a White House intern' <i22413>

senses.definition: extermely excited, especially about or at a part
